```{r}
library(MASS)
library(robustbase)
A <- MASS::mammals
B <- robustbase::Animals2

dim(A)
head(A)
tail(A)
str(A)

rownames(A)
colnames(A)

dim(B)
head(B)
tail(B)
str(B)

rownames(B)
colnames(B)

commonAnimals <- intersect(rownames(A), rownames(B))
setdiff(rownames(A), rownames(B))
setdiff(rownames(B), rownames(A))
#Gran parte de los elementos aparecen diferentes porque no estÃ¡n bien escritos.
```
